titleStmt.title: Proposals of a new modell for re-building the city of London with houses, streets, wharfes, to be forthwith set out by His Majesties and the city surveyors with the advantages that will accrue by building the same accordingly.
titleStmt.author: Knight, Val. (Valentine)

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by H. Bruges, for Samuel Speed ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
